title: Roundabout
creator_credit: Pieter Van Deusen, Leah Miller and Churchill Films
brief_description: Presents a story about a young boy’s experience with an old man who owns a magical toy merry-go-round and tells what happens when it is stolen by the boy’s friends. Designed to stimulate discussion about responsibility and consideration for others. Suitable for lower primary level.
